description.value: Tainted by the Warp: The Warp has touched youâ€”whether through exposure to the Immaterium, proximity to psykers, or darker circumstances. You sense things others cannot, but the price is corruption of body and soul.

system.benefit: Choose +3 Perception or +3 Willpower, suffer -3 Fellowship. Gain Dark Soul and Jaded talents, Forbidden Lore (Warp) as untrained skill, and 1d10 Corruption Points. Optional: Pay +300 XP for Favoured by the Warp talent and +1d10 Corruption.
system.notes: Costs 200 XP. Choose +3 Per or WP. Gain 1d10 Corruption. Optional +300 XP for Favoured by the Warp + 1d10 more Corruption.

specialAbilities.name: Warp Taint
specialAbilities.description: Gain 1d10 Corruption Points from your exposure to the Warp.

specialAbilities.name: Optional: Favoured by the Warp
specialAbilities.description: Pay an additional 300 XP to gain the Favoured by the Warp talent, but also gain an additional 1d10 Corruption Points.
